data.name: Erik Savage
data.bio: JavaScript developer with a background in the design and manufacturing of automotive and consumer electronic products, that has an affinity for solving complex problems, making data driven decisions, and building user-centric tools, apps, and websites.

data.name: Michael Metcalf
data.bio: Hi, my name is Michael. I am coming into software development from the Army where I was for past 20 years. I enjoy the challenge of coding and am looking forward to a career as a software developer. I live in the Seattle area, Gig Harbor, with my wife and our dog.

data.name: Ryan Lee
data.bio: Aspiring software developer with a penchant for placeholder text, formerly in retail management. Fond of problem and puzzle solving, as well as building things that miraculously work. Work well in teams, and experience in retail has given me a lot of patience as well as communication proficiency.

data.name: Joseph 'Joey' Hernandez
data.bio: Hello there, my name is Joey, I go by Joey, so you can call me Joey. I am a budding software development engineer based in Seattle, WA. I am a professional brewer by trade and am making a shift to something more challenging. I am also a father to four kids, husband to one wife, and I like long walks in the woods. I really enjoy fixing problems in my code, and my goal is to become a great coder someday. In my spare time I like taking things apart, building computers, and tattoos, I love tattoos.
